original_text:
He made it a decree in Joseph
    when he went out over the land of Egypt.
I hear a language I had not known:
korean_text: 하나님이 애굽 땅을 치러 나아가시던 때에 요셉의 족속 중에 이를 증거로 세우셨도다 거기서 내가 알지 못하던 말씀을 들었나니

sentences.original_text: He made it a decree in Joseph
when he went out over the land of Egypt.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 애굽 땅을 다스리러 나갔을 때에

sentences.original_text: I hear a language I had not known:
